message.content: {"id": "23935", "title": "Bug 23935: Text widget with Tree parent does not lose focus", "description": "Both widgets are children of the shell. The right tree and text only work on Windows. We can probably work around by creating the text editor as a sibling of the tree and moving it above the tree.", "OB": "On Windows, when clicking anywhere in the tree, the tree does not lose focus.", "EB": "When running build 20020920, the attached code shows that the left tree and text behave as expected on Windows and Linux.", "SR": "Clicking anywhere in the tree should not cause it to gain focus."}

origin.input_content:

', 'OB': '', 'EB': 'build 20020920Run the attached code.The left tree and text behave as they should on Windows and Linux. ', 'SR': 'When youclick anywhere in the tree the tree gets focus. '}
